Detailed Description

Author: Jaakko Luttinen ParameterList is a class for different selection of different parameters. It allows to add specific parameters into the list which are then easily modified.

int ParameterList::addParameter (  EParameterType  type,
const std::string &  title,
int  minValue,
int  stepLength,
int  stepCount,
bool  loop
) 
 

Adds a new parameter.

Parameters:
type Type of the parameter.
title Name of the parameter.
minValue Minimum value of the parameter.
stepLength Length of a step.
stepCount Number of possible steps, zero for unlimited steps.
loop Tells whether the value should loop at both ends.
Returns:
Index of the new parameter.

Increases the parameter.

void ParameterList::setParameters (  const ParameterList &  copy  ) 
 

Tries to set the parameter values using the values of given parameter list. Does NOT add or change any parameters. Just tries to set the values.

Parameters:
copy Parameter list whose values to use.

void ParameterList::setParameterValue (  int  index,
int  value
) 
 

Tries to set the parameter value to given value. It will be converted to currentStep value, so invalid step values are converted to closest match.

Parameters:
index Index of the parameter.
value The value.
